meanings.sent1: She unhatting before entering the house.
meanings.sent2: He unhatting as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The magician unhatting a rabbit instead of a dove.
meanings.sent4: The sun unhatting behind the clouds, revealing a clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The knight unhatting before the king, showing his loyalty.

meanings.definition: The act of taking off a hat
meanings.sent1: His unhatting was swift and graceful.
meanings.sent2: The unhatting at the ceremony was a tradition.
meanings.sent3: The unhatting contest at the fair was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her unhatting was like a curtain closing on the performance.
meanings.sent5: The sound of unhatting echoed through the room.
